Review Text:
We had a fantastic experience during our stay, the staff was welcoming and attentive. The check-in process was smooth and efficient.
Our room was spacious, clean, and well-equipped with all the amenities we needed.
And best of all they served us exceptional breakfast. I really love there pancakes, sausage and eggs. They also served fresh fruits and variety of bread.. This is one of the breakfast I enjoyed in my hotel stay. 
We truly enjoyed our time here and would definitely come back again...

Review Text:
This is my second stay at Rove Health city. The hotel is very conveniently located right in the middle of the city. Breakfast is amazing and the rooms are very comfortable. The best part of this hotel is the staff.The welcoming smile from Sohila when you check in is the best ! you immediately feel that you are at the right hotel. Thank you Sohila,you are an asset to the Rove brand!!!.
The staff at the breakfast is very good and accommodating. Thank you May,lin,Mahedra,Atta and chef Ayaz. I hope to see you all soon.

Review Title: Nice hotel in a good location
Review Text: Nice hotel in a good location with very nice service staff. Very good value for money. Too bad that you can't eat drinks with alcohol and snacks in the cozy lounge but only in the soberly equipped restaurant.

Beautiful, quiet, and minimalist hotel. 
The rooms are mid-sized yet comfortable
All amenities near the hotel (mosque, pharmacy, cellar, laundry, and restaurants) are governed by its Dubai location. 
The reception crew is beautiful, pleasant and helpful. Thank you all, especially Prof. Sheikh, Prof. McEn and my brother, Prof. Ram. 
Greetings to everyone
Rove concept is the best. The hotel us designed for meetings and social collaboration.  I will always recommend Rove.

Review Title: Very satisfied, many thoughtful nuances, definitely ideal for business trips (I have not tested other travel options yet
Review Text: Overall, a very positive impression of staying at the hotel, I was pleasantly surprised by how many needs of travelers are taken into account, including work matters. I personally missed a trash can with the ability to sort garbage. And it would be great to have a bathrobe in the room so that you could go down to the pool in it. Everything else was simply pleasantly surprised: the availability of a laundry room (I didn't have time to use it this time, but it is usually very necessary), booths for online negotiations, a shop right in the hotel, storage rooms for things and a bunch of other nice little things. By the way, the area around the hotel is very beautiful. There is vegetation, a beautiful view from the window. In addition, there is a free shuttle to popular places.

Review Title: Simple Hotel Provided Just What I Needed - Video Game Space Handy for Kids!
Review Text: Simple accommodations for a few days in the Healthcare City - Bur Dubai area. There is a PS5 in a "play room" just outside the restaurant which my son enjoyed.  The AC in the rooms is quite cold (I couldn't turn it up). Front desk staff Symbat and Haris were super helpful when I realized I forgot something in my room after checking out which I appreciated!
